item.description:
EASTERN MASS REIA

Next Thursday November 8th.

Randolph Holiday Inn

1357 Main st, Randolph, MA

Meeting time is 6:30PM



Annual Members do not need to pre-register.

For all others it is recommended you follow the link below

to pre-register for only $15.

Door fee is $25.




Short Sales Secrets

We had been hearing for the last couple of years that it wasn't profitable to do short sales because the bank's wouldn't cooperate.
Not here in Massachusetts.
Is that changing, has it already changed?
Our special guest will discuss this and many other things you need to be aware to be profitable in this market.

I look forward to seeing all of you next week as we spill the beans on the banks!


Save a few bucks and pre-register online at:

http://www.foreclosur...

Make sure to register today as space is limited and we will be closing registration when the room is full.
See you on Thursday!
All the best,

Derek Ebrecht

p.s. This is Our monthly networking, education, and deal making event, here at Eastern Mass REIA,

p.p.s. Have a deal and need a buyer, partner or financing? Make up a one page flier and bring plenty of copies with you! Eastern Mass REIA is also a great place to make deals!





Eastern Massachusetts Real Estate Investors Association (Formally AREI-south)

Eastern Massachusetts REIA does not claim to give expert advice in investing, nor do we endorse what featured speakers say. We do not give professional, legal, financial or tax advice. We suggest that you get competent licensed counsel before putting into effect anything you hear in our club, whether in private conversation or something said publicly. The ideas presented are only meant to stimulate your thoughts in the field of real estate investing and are not to be taken as professional advice. All investing comes with risk; therefore, as adults, it is your responsibility to exercise due diligence before making any purchase, great or small. We encourage you to be careful when ordering coffee at a McDonalds drive through window...coffee is usually hot.





Pay only $15 by preregistering.
SAVE MONEY OFF THE DOOR FEE BY REGISTERING EARLY AND guarantee SEATING AS IT IS LIMITED. The door fee is now $25. You can save $10 by preregistering.


To register follow the link to a great company we are affiliated with Foreclosuresmass.

http://www.foreclosur...

Pay only $15 dollars by preregistering now.

If you have trouble following the link copy and paste it to your browser.

Look forward to seeing many new faces this month.

See you there,

Derek Ebrecht
Eastern Massachusetts Real Estate Investors Association

group.name: EMREIA-Eastern Mass Real Estate Investors Assoc.

item.name: Eastern Massachusetts Real Estate Investment Association November Meetup
